title: Fifty Years After Zhivago, Spain Hopes Movies Will Work Magic on the Economy
text: Reuters MADRIDâ€” Half a century ago, Hollywood came to Spain , turning Madrid into revolutionary Russia and the arid south into the Wild West . Now the government is trying to lure the movie industry back with a fistful of dollars. Tinseltown
